plot: A behind-the-scenes look at this German art-house thriller, featuring interviews with director Hans-Christian Schmid and star Sandra Hüller.
title: The Making of 'Requiem'
plot_es: A behind-the-scenes look at this German art-house thriller, featuring interviews with director Hans-Christian Schmid and star Sandra Hüller.
plot_en: A behind-the-scenes look at this German art-house thriller, featuring interviews with director Hans-Christian Schmid and star Sandra Hüller.
